articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: German election: Friedrich Merz urges 'independence' from US - DW (English)
articles.description: Early projections say Germany's conservative bloc has secured some 28.5% of the votes ahead of the far-right AfD with over 20%. Conservative leader Friedrich Merz urged Europe to distance itself from the US. DW has more.
articles.content:
While the votes are still being tallied, analysts are already speculate about the future ruling coalition in Germany. 
To form a government, a majority of at least 316 seats out of the 630 seats in … [+1202 chars]

articles.author: Elena Giordano
articles.title: Gaza cease-fire looks shakier as Israel, Hamas accuse each other of breaches - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Israel delays prisoner release, charging Hamas with the “cynical use of the hostages for propaganda purposes.”
